data.title: Stephen G. Harper - Partner
data.meta_description: Stephen Harper is a partner in the New York office of Cahill Gordon & Reindel LLP’s corporate practice
data.text:
Steve Harper represents leading investment banking firms and commercial banks in financing transactions, including secured and unsecured debt offerings, bank financings, leveraged buyouts and loan commitments.

Steve represented the financing sources in numerous acquisition-related financings, including Jazz Pharmaceuticals plc’s acquisition of GW Pharmaceuticals plc, Comcast’s acquisition of UK-based Sky plc, the acquisition of RCN, Grande Communications and Wave Broadband by affiliates of TPG, CenturyLink’s acquisition of Level 3 Communications and T-Mobile’s acquisition of Sprint.

Steve has experience practicing in a variety of industries, including healthcare, financial services, technology, media and communications, retail and food services and gaming.

Steve has practiced at Cahill since his graduation from Washington and Lee University School of Law, where he was an Executive Editor of the Washington and Lee Law Review and a Lead Articles Editor for the German Law Journal.
